git_configuration: Do you want to configure git credentials? [yes|no]
github_repo_init: Do you want to initialize the GitHub repository? [yes|no]
repository_url: Enter the URL of the GitHub repository
DVC_configuration: Do you want to configure DVC? [yes|no]
data_dir: Enter the path for the dataset to move into the 'data/raw' directory, otherwise enter 'no'.
